product_name: Timex Ironman Traditional 30-Lap Oversize Watch - Men's
long_description: The Timex Ironman Traditional 30-Lap watch serves up a full quiver of triathlon-ready features at a glance, all built into a durable and competition-worthy design. Oversize digits are easily read at a glance, even as you run. Features 100 hr. chronograph with lap or split option; 30-lap memory recall; 24 hr. countdown timer with stop and repeat capabilities. Includes two time zones, plus daily, weekday and weekend alarms with 5-min. backup. INDIGLO(R) lighting lets you check the display in low light with the touch of a button. Timex Ironman Traditional 30-lap watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Ironman Traditional 30-Lap watch serves up a full quiver of triathlon-ready features at a glance, all built into a durable and competition-worthy design.
